attributes.action: Make the Freeman Hospital in Newcastle upon Tyne review it's new extortionate car parking charges for the Chroncially Sick/Disabled & Patients it Serves.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Freeman Hospital Trust in Newcastle upon Tyne has brought in a new parking charge system that does away with concessions for the Chroncically Sick & Disabled Persons that have no choice but to use the hopsital car park when visiting the hopsital for routine appointments. A Daily Charge ranging from £1.10 per hour for the first 4 hrs up to a £12 maximum per day has been brought in by Trust Chiefs, who claim they need to balance their books. This affects all visitors & patients including those that need to undergo Kidney Dialyasis at the hospitals renal unit. Accordingly it is unfair & unjust as it has been done without consultation with patients.
